name: Unnamed SCP Game
description:
Explore a not so feature rich prototype of an SCP based game!!

Features include: 

6 WHOLE SCPS!!!

4 Major ish SCPS

1 smaller one

1 Big Egg

Has a whole 3d menu screen AND Credits!! 

Like 3 different sounds!

"Wow so cool" - Friend 1

"Such a good game it doesn't have a name" - Friend 2

"You're making these up just like your friends" - Ex Friend
